name: HyperBowl San Francisco
description:
Bowl the streets of San Francisco in the fifth of the original HyperBowl lanes. Avoid the trolley cars but feel free to knock over the trash cans and fire hydrant!

Swipe the screen to roll the ball, double-tap the timer to pause.

Visit the game site http://hyperbowl.io/ more information and the Facebook page http://hyperbowl.rocks/ for the latest news.

If you enjoy this lane, check out the complete HyperBowl app featuring all of the original and new lanes!

Special thanks to all our fans on the HyperBowl Facebook page for their support and enthusiasm (especially bug-squashing help from Ischa Bijl, Raymond Chow, Lien Luong, Ian Schwabe and Elijah Taylor).

This version of HyperBowl is built with the original HyperBowl art and game assets licensed from Absolute Certainty Inc., the Unity game engine from Unity Technologies, FontLibrary from MacXWare, iTween library provided by Pixel Placement, and Localization Package from M2H Studios.

HyperBowl is a trademark of Absolute Certainty Inc.
